Events
August 5, 2025
Hosted By:
Hop Life Brewing Company
August 05, 2025 7:00PM – 9:00PM
679 NW Enterprise Dr, Port St Lucie, FL 34986
Music Bingo
Get ready for a friendly fun competition! Music Bingo is like regular Bingo…but better! Instead of calling out numbers, we play a short clip of well-known songs! If the song played is on your bingo card, dab it with your bingo blotter!
Prizes are given out every round to winners!! We encourage you to get a little help from Shazam! If you’re not cheating, you’re not trying!!
Games start promptly at 7pm! Seating is first come first serve! Full menu available in addition to Taco Tuesday Specials!
No outside food or drink
No personal cups
21 and over
August 6, 2025
Hosted By:
Hop Life Brewing Company
August 6, 2025 7:00PM – 9:00PM
679 NW Enterprise Dr, Port St Lucie, FL 34986
Bingo & Beer
Join us every Wednesday for Bingo!!! We have over 23 draft beers to choose from PLUS wine, seltzers, and slushies for those of you that are non-beer drinkers! A Full food menu with appetizers to snack on and sandwiches if you’re really hungry!!!
Try your hand at winning some gift cards from not only Hop Life, but some other local spots!!
No outside food or drink
No personal cups
21 and over
August 7, 2025
Hosted By:
Hop Life Brewing Company
August 7, 2025 7:00PM – 9:00PM
679 NW Enterprise Dr, Port St Lucie, FL 34986
Trivia Night
TRIVIA THURSDAYS!!! Every Thursday night, bring out your friends and test your knowledge! Team sign-ups will begin at 6:30pm. Games will start at 7pm!
Cell phone use is prohibited. Put those big brains to use and see if you have what it takes to beat the other teams!
No outside food or drink
No personal cups
August 8, 2025
Hosted By:
Hop Life Brewing Company
August 8, 2025 8:00PM – 11:00PM
679 NW Enterprise Dr, Port St Lucie, FL 34986
Rezen8 Returns to HopLife Brewery
We are heading back to everybody’s favorite craft brewery and hit the stage
with our high energy rock ‘n’ roll show.
We will continue paying homage to the late great Ozzy Osbourne along with all of your favorite Rock ‘n’ Roll!!
It’s going to be a full-blown party under their covered awning, so bring your crew down to this great venue!!
August 9, 2025
Hosted By:
Hop Life Brewing Company
August 9, 2025 8:00PM – 11:00PM
679 NW Enterprise Dr, Port St Lucie, FL 34986
Country Line Dancing and Open Dance
Kick up your boots and hit the floor! We are partnering with Coastal Cadence!
Join us for an energetic evening of Country Line Dancing lessons, mixed in with some open dance time! Whether you’re a seasoned pro or just looking to have a good time, this night is all about fun, movement, and great music! An instructor will be on site to teach the moves to those that want to learn!
Date: August 9th
Time: 8pm – 11pm
Location: Hop Life Brewing Company
Dress Code: Casual or Country Chic – boots are encouraged!!
No Admission! This event is free to the public! Come solo, bring a partner, or round up your friends because it’s going to be a boot-stompin good time!
August 10, 2025
Hosted By:
Hop Life Brewing Company
August 10, 2025 11:00AM
679 NW Enterprise Dr, Port St Lucie, FL 34986
Bounce, Beats, & Brews – Rebounding Class (Trampolines)
Here we go again! Last time, we sold out, 70 trampolines!!
Join us for a class unlike any other! Reserve your spot here:
winderwellness.com
Zero experience necessary and literally ALL fitness levels are encouraged to come, just need to be 16+ please.
This event is a 1 hour class that comes with a swag bag packed with nutrition supplements, skincare goodies, a booty band workout band, plus 20% off beer from Hop Life.
Brazingline, Brazilian Athletic Wear will be there as will all of their cutest workout gear, so be ready to shop.
You MUST register for these events to reserve your trampoline.
There are 65 spots available, so grab your friends and reserve a whole row! Yes, 65 spots! And they all sold out last time!
August 12, 2025
Hosted By:
Hop Life Brewing Company
August 12, 2025 7:00PM – 9:00PM
679 NW Enterprise Dr, Port St Lucie, FL 34986
Summer Karaoke Night
Every other Tuesday we will be hosting Karaoke!! Starting at 7pm and hosted by the wonderful Roy Price!!
We have Seltzers, Slushies, Wine, Sangria, and over 23 Beers on Tap!!! Plus, a delicious selection of food!! Get here early and grab some dinner and drinks. Settle in for an epic night of singing and dancing.
Song requests will go through your phone! Simply scan the QR code to submit your song choice!! They have practically every song you could want! Summer nights have NEVER been this fun before

679 NW Enterprise Dr, Port St Lucie, FL 34986
Daniel Keith
If you are a fan of country music, Daniel Keith is the guy for you! Singing the best hits. New and Old!
Come out August 15th at 8pm and grab dinner and a show!!

No personal cups
August 16, 2025
Hosted By:
Hop Life Brewing Company
August 16, 2025 7:30PM – 10:30PM
679 NW Enterprise Dr, Port St Lucie, FL 34986
Dueling Pianos
Dueling pianos is a modern-day musical act involving two piano players or sometimes one piano player and a guitarist. These musicians share the stage, each with their own piano or keyboard, facing each other.
But unlike the original competitions, today’s dueling pianos are usually not a battle, but rather a cooperative performance designed to engage and entertain the audience.
Show starts at 7:30pm! Seating is first come first serve and we do fill up fast! Early arrival is recommended!

Hosted By:
Hop Life Brewing Company
August 17, 2025 1:00PM – 4:00PM
679 NW Enterprise Dr, Port St Lucie, FL 34986
The Band Freya
The Band Freya takes the stage at 1pm! This father daughter duo is the perfect complement to a Sunday afternoon brunch!! This is a family friendly so bring out the whole gang for Sunday Funday!!
No outside food or drink
No personal cups

August 21, 2025
Hosted By:
Hop Life Brewing Company
August 21, 2025 7:00PM – 9:00PM
679 NW Enterprise Dr, Port St Lucie, FL 34986
Star Wars Trivia Night
A Long Time Ago in a Galaxy Far, Far Away… Star Wars Trivia was born!!
Test your knowledge of the force, the rebellion, and the Empire in a galaxy where only the true fans survive! Do you know the odds of surviving this trivia night? C-3PO says its 3,720 to 1 – but you’ve got a better chance after a beer or two.
– August 21st
– 7pm – 9pm
– Hop Life Brewery
Bring your team, use the force (or Google….just kidding don’t do that) and avoid imperial entanglements. Let’s settle once and for all who shot first.
May the force, the laughs & the answers be with you!
No outside food or drink
No personal cups
August 22, 2025
Hosted By:
Hop Life Brewing Company
August 22, 2025 8:00PM – 11:00PM
679 NW Enterprise Dr, Port St Lucie, FL 34986
Memphis Pilkerton
Memphis Pilkerton is coming back again! Whether you’re a fan of country, rock, or folk, Memphis’s performance will grab you, your friends, and don’t forget your next round.
No outside food or drink
No personal cups
August 23, 2025
Hosted By:
Hop Life Brewing Company
August 23, 2025 8:00PM – 11:00PM
679 NW Enterprise Dr, Port St Lucie, FL 34986
Chemistry! The Ultimate 80s Music Experience
Chemistry is the premier synth-pop-rock tribute to the Decade of Decadence, the 80s. Yes, the whole decade – the Golden Age of big hair bands, synthesizers, parachute pants, Max Headroom and MTV. And for Chemistry, it’s all about the MUSIC!
This high energy “awesome foursome” captures the essence of each song, reproducing them with the energy, feel and precision you’d expect from the original artists. Chemistry accurately brings back the totally tubular sounds of The Motels, Missing Persons, Duran Duran, Cutting Crew, Pat Benatar and many more that played on your Boombox back in the day!
Come out August 23rd and check out the show! 8pm start time! Seating is first come first serve. We do recommend you get here early.
No outside food or drink
No personal cups
No reservations
21+

679 NW Enterprise Dr, Port St Lucie, FL 34986
Songs That Jeff Likes
Jeff is coming back for Brunch! One guy with an acoustic guitar playing his favorites from mostly the 80s and 90s layered with loop. He is sure to leave you entertained and wanting more!

August 30, 2025
Hosted By:
Hop Life Brewing Company
August 30, 2025 8:00PM – 11:00PM
679 NW Enterprise Dr, Port St Lucie, FL 34986
Thick As Thieves
HopLife + Thick as Thieves = Party mode ON! Thick as Thieves is coming back to Rock the Beer Garden! Come out and listen to some rock music and dance the night away!!!
Beer’s cold, food’s hot and makes a perfect night!
– No outside food or drink
– No personal cups
– 21 and over
August 31, 2025
Hosted By:
Hop Life Brewing Company
August 31, 2025 1:00PM – 4:00PM
679 NW Enterprise Dr, Port St Lucie, FL 34986
Brad Brock
Brad Brock’s One Man Band Show features an eclectic mix of pop, rock, blues, reggae, and original tunes arranged in his unique one-man band style. He plays guitar, drums, bass, harmonica, and sings in harmony without the use of loop pedals or pre-recorded backing tracks to create a truly live band experience. Brad’s sound is influenced by such great artists like John Mayer, Tom Petty, and Cat Stevens.
Show starts at 1pm.
Brunch Menu 12pm – 3pm
Live Music 1pm – 4pm
Half off Growler Fills ALL DAY
This is a family friendly event, bring out the whole crew!

Hop Life
About Us
About Us
Hop Life Brewing Company
was founded in 2011 by Jim Kelly as an apparel company, with the proceeds used to establish the foundation of the brewery. In 2012 Robert Tearle joined the company and in 2016 Jeffrey Blitman partnered with us.
​
As home brewers, we take pride in embracing the art of the brewing culture. Our commitment is to use only the finest ingredients for our specialty- made hand crafted beer. Hop Life Brewing Company is more than a craft brewing company, it’s a way of life. Jim and Rob are both aware of the importance of values, passion, and dedicated teamwork due to their successful careers in the fire service. Jim is a 33-year veteran firefighter and recently retired Battalion Chief with the Saint Lucie County Fire District.
​
Jim has owned and operated two previous businesses, a landscaping business and Blue Water Pool service. Rob is a 28-year veteran firefighter, and currently works with the Air Rescue Program on the Saint Lucie County Fire District. Jeffrey Blitman founded a packaging manufacturing company in 1987 which was sold and for almost 20 years owned a golf car distribution company in Broward County. In aspiring to move toward the next phase in our lives, we’ve moved on to create, manufacture, and distribute some of the finest craft beer produced in the State of Florida. We work with a state-of-the-art brewing system, in a facility where people can come to relax, enjoy, and even learn about the fine art of brewing great beer. The focal point of the brewery is a 15-barrel stainless steel brew house, several fermenters and brite tanks, along with the brewing process itself.
​
The 2000+ square foot Brew House is separated by a large glass window from the Taproom.
Hop Life Brewing Company
offers not only a great place to enjoy Artisan Crafted beers, but beers that cannot be found in other breweries. Its goal is to be a gathering place for all beer lovers, from the connoisseur to the curious. This passion for brewing great beer drives us to work hard in creating products that not only sit well on the palette but allow our patrons to enjoy new and innovate craft beers.
Click
here
to watch some clips of our canning process!
